title: Google\Cloud\Optimization\V1\AggregatedMetrics
name: AggregatedMetrics
description:
Aggregated metrics for [ShipmentRoute][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute] (resp. for [OptimizeToursResponse][google.cloud.optimization.v1.OptimizeToursResponse] over all [Transition][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.Transition] and/or [Visit][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.Visit] (resp. over all [ShipmentRoute][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute]) elements.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.optimization.v1.AggregatedMetrics

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.performed_shipment_count
params.description: Number of shipments performed. Note that a pickup and delivery pair only counts once.

params.name: data.travel_duration
params.description: Total travel duration for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.wait_duration
params.description: Total wait duration for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.delay_duration
params.description: Total delay duration for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.break_duration
params.description: Total break duration for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.visit_duration
params.description: Total visit duration for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.total_duration
params.description: The total duration should be equal to the sum of all durations above. For routes, it also corresponds to [ShipmentRoute.vehicle_end_time][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.vehicle_end_time] - [ShipmentRoute.vehicle_start_time][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.vehicle_start_time].

params.name: data.travel_distance_meters
params.description: Total travel distance for a route or a solution.

params.name: data.max_loads
params.description: Maximum load achieved over the entire route (resp. solution), for each of the quantities on this route (resp. solution), computed as the maximum over all [Transition.vehicle_loads][google.cloud.optimization.v1.ShipmentRoute.Transition.vehicle_loads] (resp. [ShipmentRoute.metrics.max_loads][google.cloud.optimization.v1.AggregatedMetrics.max_loads].

params.name: data.costs
params.description: Deprecated: Use [ShipmentRoute.route_costs][] and [OptimizeToursResponse.Metrics.costs][] instead.

params.name: data.total_cost
params.description: Deprecated: Use [ShipmentRoute.route_total_cost][] and [OptimizeToursResponse.Metrics.total_cost][] instead.
